title: SessionArgs
description: Schema for session tool arguments. Unified session management with get/set operations for workflow mode, active task, and feature.

operation.description: Operation: 'get' retrieves session state, 'set' updates it

mode.description: Workflow mode (for set operation): analysis (read-only), planning (design), coding (full access), disabled (no restrictions)

task.description: Description of current task (for set operation)
